Text.Page:
We need to understand the implications of these zomgul gatherers. The Mysterium regards our findings with a fair amount of alarm.

Find {@LinkCreature:250#1021} and give him some fresh samples to study.

Intriguing. The heart's function remains unclear, for the zomgul clearly doesn't use it to pump blood.

Their interest in fusing organic part into constructs may speak to their ultimate goals.

Fascinating.
Without fresh zomgul hearts, there can be no inquiry.
